discourse_list.title: Grafana Dashboard for Maker Keeper Network

content.content: Hello all, just a quick update that TechOps CU has prepared a dashboard to view the average latency for each of the keeper networks to process requests. This will help to track the performance. You can view it here: Grafana  Screen Shot 2023-03-16 at 4.46.55 PM1920×1137 104 KB

How does the request mechanism work exactly? Is there some documentation available somewhere? Edit: I found it in the relevant MIP:   MIPs Portal    MIPs Portal Maker Improvement Proposals are the preferred mechanism for improving both Maker Governance and the Maker Protocol.      It might be good to include technical explanations like the one in MIP63 to https://docs.makerdao.com/ as well.

Yes agree although personally I do not have the time. The project needs to be moved to production as well, but there are higher priorities at the moment. If someone wants to pick this up that would help. They can ping me for questions.
